column7: Nature and scope of projects to be determined by consultation between student and faculty adviser; open to landscape architecture majors as well as those from other disciplines who wish to engage in interdisciplinary work. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 1 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
